full_threads.body:
Great! Thanks Adam.

Michelle, please send through the video and other content as it becomes available so we can finalise the setup of this page.
@heath We are just waiting on the content right?

Hi Heath,

I've tested it on several different networks, and it all appears to be working, only allowed on the patient wifi network, and all IP addresses were correct 😊

Cheers,

Adam Vaughan

IT Systems Administrator

Wolper Jewish Hospital

8 Trelawney Street

Woollahra NSW 2025

Email: AdamVaughan@wolper.com.au

Phone: 04 1708 ADAM (0417 082 326)

Hi Adam, 

Thanks for testing this at your end. 

We think the session may have been getting cached, so have set it up as an ajax query. Can you please visit this link: https://wolper.com.au/test-wolper-page/ when being connected to the WiFi and not connected and send us the screenshots?

Hi Heath,

"You are not allowed to view this content." irrespective of whether on the patient wifi network or any other network ☹

(see attached)

Cheers,

Adam Vaughan

IT Systems Administrator

Wolper Jewish Hospital

8 Trelawney Street

Woollahra NSW 2025

Email: AdamVaughan@wolper.com.au

Phone: 04 1708 ADAM (0417 082 326)

Hi Adam and Michelle, 

We have setup two messages, see attached. If you are at the hospital you will see "You are allowed to view this content.". If you are not at the hospital, you should see "You are not allowed to view this content.

Can you please test at your end and see if it works for you? We have also cleared the server cache, hopefully this helps.

Hi Joel,

It hasn't changed from the one below.

Cheers,

Adam Vaughan

IT Systems Administrator

Wolper Jewish Hospital

8 Trelawney Street

Woollahra NSW 2025

Email: AdamVaughan@wolper.com.au

Phone: 04 1708 ADAM (0417 082 326)

Hi Adam,

We made some changes on the redirect. Would you be able to send us your "public IP address"? 
https://whatismyipaddress.com/
@heath Maybe the ip address is different now.

Hi Heath,

Yes it was the Test page I was seeing everywhere. Now it redirects to the Wolper home page, including on the patient wifi network ☹

Cheers,

Adam Vaughan

IT Systems Administrator

Wolper Jewish Hospital

8 Trelawney Street

Woollahra NSW 2025

Email: AdamVaughan@wolper.com.au

Phone: 04 1708 ADAM (0417 082 326)

Hi Adam, 

Can I check that you are actually seeing https://wolper.com.au/test-wolper-page/ and not the home page? 

We have it set to redirect to the home page if you are not coming from the specified IP address.

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Yes, we can access the Test page. Unfortunately, we can access it from anywhere, including my home ☹

Cheers,

Adam Vaughan

IT Systems Administrator

Wolper Jewish Hospital

8 Trelawney Street

Woollahra NSW 2025

Email: AdamVaughan@wolper.com.au

Phone: 04 1708 ADAM (0417 082 326)

Hi Adam, 

Can you please let us know if you can access this page while on the WiFi? 

https://wolper.com.au/test-wolper-page/

If you can't access it you will simply be redirected to the home page.

@heath All good now on this one. Here is a link: https://wolper.com.au/test-wolper-page/
The below are the ip address I have whitelisted and if you are logged in as administrator can visit the page.

49.144.213.178 - joel 
180.150.44.12 - // wolper

Hi Heath,

I'm assuming you mean the external IP address? If so, it's 180.150.44.12

Cheers,

Adam Vaughan

IT Systems Administrator

Wolper Jewish Hospital

8 Trelawney Street

Woollahra NSW 2025

Email: AdamVaughan@wolper.com.au

Phone: 04 1708 ADAM (0417 082 326)

Thanks Jaqui, 

I'll be in touch with next steps. 

Adam, when you have a moment, can you please provide us the IP Address(es) of the WiFi. We are planning to only allow traffic from those IP's to be able to view this particular area of the site.

Hi Heath and Adam

Our rehab video is now done. As discussed we only want it to be available to people who are at Wolper and connected to the Wolper wifi. Plus I like your suggested idea of having a QR code that patients can scan to watch the video.

Can you please advise next steps on how to make this all happen?

Thanks
Jaqui



Jaqui Herman
Operations Assistant
Wolper Jewish Hospital

E: jaquiherman@wolper.com.au <mailto:jaquiherman@wolper.com.au> 8 Trelawney Street
T: 02 8324 2238 F: 02 9327 5973 Woollahra NSW 2025
